GenerateToken.summary: Generates a token for accessing an application in an instance.

schema.description: The client secret. This parameter is required if grant_type is set to client_credentials.

schema.title: 授权类型
schema.description:
The authorization type. Valid values:

*
*
*
*
*

<!---->

*   authorization_code
*   urn:ietf:params:oauth:grant-type:device_code
*   refresh_token
*   client_credentials: You must specify the client_id and client_secret parameters.
*   password: This option is not supported.

schema.title: code码
schema.description: The authorization code. This parameter is required if grant_type is set to authorization_code.

schema.title: 用户名
schema.description: The username. This parameter is required if grant_type is set to password. The password authentication type is not supported.

schema.title: 密码
schema.description: The username. This parameter is required if grant_type is set to password. The password authentication type is not supported.

schema.title: 设备码
schema.description: The device code. This parameter is required if grant_type is set to authorization_code.urn:ietf:params:oauth:grant-type:device_code.

schema.title: 重定向URI
schema.description: The redirect URI. This parameter is required if grant_type is set to authorization_code. The value of this parameter must be the same as the redirect URI in the request to obtain the authorization code.

schema.title: 更新token
schema.description: The refreshed token. This parameter is required if grant_type is set to refresh_token.

schema.title: scope范围
schema.description:
The authorization scope. Valid values:

*   openid
*   email
*   phone
*   profile

token_type.title: token类型，包含Basic,Bearer
token_type.description: The type of the token. Valid values: Basic Bearer

expires_in.title: 有效时长，单位秒
expires_in.description: The remaining validity period of the token. Unit: seconds.

expires_at.title: 过期时间
expires_at.description: The time when the token expires. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of seconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

GenerateToken.title: GenerateToken
GenerateToken.description:
> 

*   The following authorization types are supported: authorization code, device code, refresh token, and client credentials.

expires_in.title: device_code和user_code的有效时长，单位秒
expires_in.description: The remaining validity period of the device code. Unit: seconds.

expires_at.title: 过期时间
expires_at.description: The time when the token expires. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of seconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

interval.title: 请求token节点的超时时间，单位秒
interval.description: The timeout period of the request token. Unit: seconds.

GetUserInfo.summary: Queries the information of a user by using the user token.

schema.title: 认证信息，格式:Bearer access_token
schema.description: The authentication information. Format: Bearer ${access_token}. Example: Bearer ATxxxx.

GetUserInfo.title: GetUserInfo

RevokeToken.summary: Revokes an access token or refresh token.

schema.title: token类型
schema.description: The type of the token. Valid values: access_token refresh_token

RevokeToken.title: RevokeToken

GetApplicationProvisioningScope.summary: Queries the synchronization scope of an application in an instance.

schema.title: 认证信息，格式:Bearer access_token
schema.description: The authentication information. Format: Bearer ${access_token}. Example: Bearer ATxxxx.

items.description: The ID of the organizational unit.

GetApplicationProvisioningScope.title: GetApplicationProvisioningScope
GetApplicationProvisioningScope.description:
> 

*   You can go to the Applications page in the IDaaS console to set the synchronization scope. After an application is created, the application has the permission to call this operation by default.

schema.title: 认证信息，格式:Bearer access_token
schema.description: The authentication information. Format: Bearer ${access_token}. Example: Bearer ATxxxx.

organizationalUnitName.title: 机构名称
organizationalUnitName.description: The name of the organizational unit.

parentId.title: 父机构ID
parentId.description: The ID of the parent organizational unit.

organizationalUnitExternalId.title: 机构外部ID
organizationalUnitExternalId.description:
The external ID of the organizational unit. The external ID can be used to map external data to the data of the organizational unit in Employee Identity and Access Management (EIAM) of Identity as a Service (IDaaS). By default, the external ID is the organizational unit ID.

For organizational units with the same source type and source ID, each organizational unit has a unique external ID.

description.title: 描述
description.description: The description of the organizational unit.

organizationalUnitId.title: 机构ID
organizationalUnitId.description: The ID of the organizational unit.

schema.title: 认证信息，格式:Bearer access_token

schema.title: 机构ID
schema.description: The ID of the organizational unit.

organizationalUnitName.title: 机构名称
organizationalUnitName.description: The name of the organizational unit.

description.title: 机构描述

GetOrganizationalUnit.summary: Queries the information of an organizational unit.

schema.title: 认证信息，格式:Bearer access_token
schema.description: The authentication information. Format: Bearer ${access_token}. Example: Bearer ATxxxx.

schema.title: 机构ID
schema.description: The ID of the organizational unit.

organizationalUnitId.title: 机构ID
organizationalUnitId.description: The ID of the organizational unit.

organizationalUnitName.title: 机构名称
organizationalUnitName.description: The name of the organizational unit.

parentId.title: 父机构ID
parentId.description: The ID of the parent organizational unit.

organizationalUnitExternalId.title: 外部ID
organizationalUnitExternalId.description: The external ID of the organizational unit.

organizationalUnitSourceType.title: 来源类型
organizationalUnitSourceType.description:
The source type of the organizational unit. Valid values:

*   build_in: The organizational unit was created in Identity as a Service (IDaaS).
*   ding_talk: The organizational unit was imported from DingTalk.
*   ad: The organizational unit was imported from Microsoft Active Directory (AD).
*   ldap: The organizational unit was imported from a Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) service.

organizationalUnitSourceId.title: 来源ID
organizationalUnitSourceId.description: The source ID of the organizational unit.

createTime.title: 创建时间，毫秒
createTime.description: The time when the organizational unit was created. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

updateTime.title: 最近一次更新时间，毫秒
updateTime.description: The time when the organizational unit was last updated. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

description.title: 描述
description.description: The description of the organizational unit.

GetOrganizationalUnit.title: GetOrganizationalUnit

schema.title: 认证信息，格式:Bearer access_token
schema.description: The authentication information. Format: Bearer ${access_token}. Example: Bearer ATxxxx.

schema.title: 机构ID
schema.description: The ID of the organizational unit.

ListOrganizationalUnits.summary: Queries the information of Employee Identity and Access Management (EIAM) organizational units by page.

schema.title: 认证信息，格式:Bearer access_token
schema.description: The authentication information. Format: Bearer ${access_token}. Example: Bearer ATxxxx.

schema.title: 父机构ID
schema.description: The ID of the parent organizational unit.

schema.title: 单页大小，默认20
schema.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 20. Valid values: 1 to 100.

totalCount.title: 记录总数
totalCount.description: The total number of entries returned.

organizationalUnitId.title: 机构ID
organizationalUnitId.description: The ID of the organizational unit.

organizationalUnitName.title: 机构名称
organizationalUnitName.description: The name of the organizational unit.

parentId.title: 父机构ID
parentId.description: The ID of the parent organizational unit.

organizationalUnitExternalId.title: 外部ID
organizationalUnitExternalId.description:
The external ID of the organizational unit. The external ID can be used to map external data to the data of the organizational unit in EIAM of Identity as a Service (IDaaS). By default, the external ID is the organizational unit ID.

Note: For organizational units with the same source type and source ID, each organizational unit has a unique external ID.

organizationalUnitSourceType.title: 来源类型
organizationalUnitSourceType.description:
The source type of the organizational unit. Valid values:

*   build_in: The organizational unit was created in IDaaS.
*   ding_talk: The organizational unit was imported from DingTalk.
*   ad: The organizational unit was imported from Microsoft Active Directory (AD).
*   ldap: The organizational unit was imported from a Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) service.

organizationalUnitSourceId.title: 来源ID
organizationalUnitSourceId.description:
The source ID of the organizational unit.

If the organizational unit was created in IDaaS, its source ID is the ID of the IDaaS instance. If the organizational unit was imported, its source ID is the enterprise ID in the source. For example, if the organizational unit was imported from DingTalk, its source ID is the corpId value of the enterprise in DingTalk.

createTime.title: 创建时间，毫秒
createTime.description: The time when the organizational unit was created. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

updateTime.title: 最近一次更新时间，毫秒
updateTime.description: The time when the organizational unit was last updated. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

description.title: 描述
description.description: The description of the organizational unit.

ListOrganizationalUnits.title: ListOrganizationalUnits

ListOrganizationalUnitParentIds.summary: Queries the information of all the parent organizational units of an organizational unit.

schema.title: 认证信息，格式:Bearer access_token
schema.description: The authentication information. Format: Bearer ${access_token}. Example: Bearer ATxxxx.

schema.title: 机构ID
schema.description: The ID of the organizational unit.

parentIds.title: 父机构ID列表，顺序层级从上到下
parentIds.description: The IDs of the parent organizational units. The IDs of the organizational unit are ordered based on their levels from high to low. Only the IDs of the organizational units within the authorization scope are displayed.

items.description: The ID of the organizational unit.

ListOrganizationalUnitParentIds.title: ListOrganizationalUnitParentIds

GetOrganizationalUnitIdByExternalId.summary: Obtains the ID of an organizational unit based on the external ID

schema.title: 认证信息，格式:Bearer access_token
schema.description: The authentication information. Format: Bearer ${access_token}. Example: Bearer ATxxxx.

organizationalUnitExternalId.title: 组织外部ID
organizationalUnitExternalId.description:
The external ID of the organizational unit. The external ID can be used to map external data to the data of the organizational unit in Employee Identity and Access Management (EIAM) of Identity as a Service (IDaaS). By default, the external ID is the organizational unit ID.

Note: For organizational units with the same source type and source ID, each organizational unit has a unique external ID.

organizationalUnitSourceType.title: 组织来源类型, 取值可选范围： build_in(自建), ding_talk(钉钉导入),ad(AD导入),ldap(LDAP导入)
organizationalUnitSourceType.description:
The source type of the organizational unit. Valid values:

*   build_in: The organizational unit was created in IDaaS.
*   ding_talk: The organizational unit was imported from DingTalk.
*   ad: The organizational unit was imported from Microsoft Active Directory (AD).
*   ldap: The organizational unit was imported from a Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) service.

organizationalUnitSourceId.title: 组织来源ID,自建类型(build_in)值为实例ID，非自建类型，为对应企业ID，比如钉钉，对应的corpId
organizationalUnitSourceId.description:
The source ID of the organizational unit.

If the organizational unit was created in IDaaS, its source ID is the ID of the IDaaS instance. If the organizational unit was imported, its source ID is the enterprise ID in the source. For example, if the organizational unit was imported from DingTalk, its source ID is the corpId value of the enterprise in DingTalk.

organizationalUnitId.title: 机构ID
organizationalUnitId.description: The ID of the organizational unit.

GetOrganizationalUnitIdByExternalId.title: GetOrganizationalUnitIdByExternalId

CreateUser.summary: Creates an Employee Identity and Access Management (EIAM) account in an organizational unit.

schema.title:
认证信息。
格式:Bearer ${access_token}。
示例：Bearer ATxxxx。
schema.description: The authentication information. Format: Bearer ${access_token}. Example: Bearer ATxxxx.

displayName.title: 账户展示名。
displayName.description: The display name of the account. The display name can be up to 64 characters in length.

password.title: 密码, 参考密码策略
password.description: The password of the account. For information about the password rules, go to the Create User panel in the Identity as a Service (IDaaS) console.

phoneRegion.title: 手机地区编号,示例：中国大陆手区号为86，不带 00 或 +, 手机号若设置，此参数必填
phoneRegion.description: The country code of the mobile number. For example, the country code of China is 86 without 00 or +. This parameter is required if a mobile number is specified.

phoneNumber.title: 手机号
phoneNumber.description: The mobile number of the user who owns the account.

phoneNumberVerified.title: 手机号是否验证，手机号若设置此字段必须设置，无特殊业务可直接设置为true
phoneNumberVerified.description: Indicates whether the mobile number is verified. This field is required if a mobile number is specified. If you have no special requirement, set this parameter to true.

email.title: 邮箱
email.description: The email address of the user who owns the account.

emailVerified.title: 邮箱是否验证，邮箱若设置此字段必须设置，无特殊业务可直接设置为true
emailVerified.description: Indicates whether the email address is verified. This field is required if an email address is specified. If you have no special requirement, set this parameter to true.

userExternalId.title: 账户外部ID
userExternalId.description: The external ID of the account. The external ID can be used to map external data to the data of the account in EIAM of Identity as a Service (IDaaS). By default, the external ID is the account ID.

primaryOrganizationalUnitId.title: 账户主机构ID
primaryOrganizationalUnitId.description: The ID of the primary organizational unit.

description.title: 描述
description.description: The description of the account. The description can be up to 256 characters in length.

passwordInitializationPolicyPriority.title: 密码初始化策略优先级，不传不生效。枚举取值:global(全局优先)、custom(自定义优先)

passwordForcedUpdateStatus.title: 强制修改密码状态,默认不启用。枚举取值:enabled(开启)、disabled(禁用)

userNotificationChannels.title: 密码通知渠道。枚举取值:email(邮件)、sms(短信)

passwordInitializationType.title: 密码初始化方式。枚举取值:random(随机)

schema.title: 调用CreateUser接口在指定组织下，创建新的EIAM的账户资源

CreateUser.title: CreateUser

PatchUser.summary: Modifies an Employee Identity and Access Management (EIAM) account.

schema.title:
认证信息。
格式:Bearer ${access_token}。
示例：Bearer ATxxxx。
schema.description: The authentication information. Format: Bearer ${access_token}. Example: Bearer ATxxxx.

displayName.title: 账户展示名
displayName.description: The display name of the account.

phoneRegion.title: 手机地区编号,示例：中国大陆手区号为86，不带 00 或 +, 手机号若设置，此参数必填
phoneRegion.description: The country code of the mobile number. For example, the country code of China is 86 without 00 or +. This parameter is required if a mobile number is specified.

phoneNumber.title: 手机号
phoneNumber.description: The mobile number of the user who owns the account.

phoneNumberVerified.title: 手机号是否验证，手机号若设置此字段必须设置，无特殊业务可直接设置为true
phoneNumberVerified.description: Indicates whether the mobile number is verified. This field is required if a mobile number is specified. If you have no special requirement, set this parameter to true.

email.title: 邮箱
email.description: The email address of the user who owns the account.

emailVerified.title: 邮箱是否验证，邮箱若设置此字段必须设置，无特殊业务可直接设置为true
emailVerified.description: Indicates whether the email address is verified. This field is required if an email address is specified. If you have no special requirement, set this parameter to true.

operation.description:
字段操作类型，取值可选范围：
- add：添加。
- replace：替换。若对应扩展字段无设置值，会转换为add操作。
- remove：移除。

PatchUser.title: PatchUser
PatchUser.description: The operation conforms to the HTTP PATCH request method. The value of a parameter is modified only if the parameter is specified in the request.

GetUser.summary: Queries the information of an Employee Identity and Access Management (EIAM) account.

schema.title:
认证信息。
格式:Bearer ${access_token}。
示例：Bearer ATxxxx。
schema.description: The authentication information. Format: Bearer ${access_token}. Example: Bearer ATxxxx.

organizationalUnits.title: 账户所属组织列表
organizationalUnits.description: The organizational units to which the account belongs.

organizationalUnitId.title: 机构ID
organizationalUnitId.description: The ID of the organizational unit.

organizationalUnitName.title: 机构名称
organizationalUnitName.description: The name of the organizational unit.

primary.title: 是否主机构
primary.description: Indicates whether the organizational unit is the primary organizational unit.

primaryOrganizationalUnitId.title: 账户主机构ID
primaryOrganizationalUnitId.description: The ID of the primary organizational unit of the account.

customFields.title: 账户扩展字段列表
customFields.description: The extended fields of the account.

fieldName.title: 字段标识
fieldName.description: The name of the extended field.

fieldValue.title: 字段数据值
fieldValue.description: The value of the extended field. Field values are returned as strings regardless of the data types of the fields. For example, true or false is returned for a Boolean field.

displayName.title: 显示名
displayName.description: The display name of the account.

passwordSet.title: 密码是否已设置
passwordSet.description: Indicates whether the password is set.

phoneRegion.title: 手机地区编号,示例：中国大陆手区号为86，不带 00 或 +
phoneRegion.description: The country code of the mobile number. For example, the country code of China is 86 without 00 or +.

phoneNumber.title: 手机号
phoneNumber.description: The mobile number of the user who owns the account.

phoneNumberVerified.title: 手机号是否验证
phoneNumberVerified.description: Indicates whether the mobile number has been verified. A value of true indicates that the mobile number has been verified by the user or has been set to the verified status by the administrator. A value of false indicates that the mobile number has not been verified.

email.title: 邮箱
email.description: The email address of the user.

emailVerified.title: 邮箱是否验证
emailVerified.description: Indicates whether the email address has been verified. A value of true indicates that the email address has been verified by the user or has been set to the verified status by the administrator. A value of false indicates that the email address has not been verified.

userExternalId.title: 外部ID
userExternalId.description:
The external ID of the account. The external ID can be used to map external data to the data of the account in EIAM of Identity as a Service (IDaaS). By default, the external ID is the account ID.

Note: For accounts with the same source type and source ID, each account has a unique external ID.

userSourceType.title: 来源类型，build_in[自建],ding_talk[钉钉导入],ad[AD导入],ldap[LDAP导入]
userSourceType.description:
The source type of the account. Valid values:

*   build_in: The account was created in IDaaS.
*   ding_talk: The account was imported from DingTalk.
*   ad: The account was imported from Microsoft Active Directory (AD).
*   ldap: The account was imported from a Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) service.

userSourceId.title: 来源ID
userSourceId.description:
The source ID of the account.

If the account was created in IDaaS, its source ID is the ID of the IDaaS instance. If the account was imported, its source ID is the enterprise ID in the source. For example, if the account was imported from DingTalk, its source ID is the corpId value of the enterprise in DingTalk.

status.title: 账户状态, enabled:启用,disabled:禁用
status.description: The status of the account. Valid values: enabled disabled

accountExpireTime.title: 账户过期时间, 毫秒时间
accountExpireTime.description: The time when the account expires. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

registerTime.description: The time when the account was registered. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

lockExpireTime.title: 锁定过期时间, 毫秒时间
lockExpireTime.description: The time when the account lock expires. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

createTime.title: 创建时间, 毫秒时间
createTime.description: The time when the account was created. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

updateTime.title: 最近一次更新时间, 毫秒时间
updateTime.description: The time when the account was last modified. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

userSourceId.description:
The source ID of the account.

If the account was created in IDaaS, its source ID is the ID of the IDaaS instance. If the account was imported, its source ID is the enterprise ID in the source. For example, if the account was imported from DingTalk, its source ID is the corpId value of the enterprise in DingTalk.

status.title: 账户状态, enabled:启用,disabled:禁用
status.description: The status of the account. Valid values: enabled disabled

accountExpireTime.title: 账户过期时间, 毫秒时间
accountExpireTime.description: The time when the account expires. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

registerTime.description: The time when the account was registered. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

lockExpireTime.title: 锁定过期时间, 毫秒时间
lockExpireTime.description: The time when the account lock expires. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

createTime.title: 创建时间, 毫秒时间
createTime.description: The time when the account was created. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

updateTime.title: 最近一次更新时间, 毫秒时间
updateTime.description: The time when the account was last modified. This value is a UNIX timestamp representing the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

ListUsers.title: ListUsers

EnableUser.summary: Enables an Employee Identity and Access Management (EIAM) account.

schema.title:
认证信息。
格式:Bearer ${access_token}。
示例：Bearer ATxxxx。
schema.description: The authentication information. Format: Bearer ${access_token}. Example: Bearer ATxxxx.

EnableUser.title: EnableUser

DisableUser.summary: Disables an Employee Identity and Access Management (EIAM) account.

schema.title:
认证信息。
格式:Bearer ${access_token}。
示例：Bearer ATxxxx。
schema.description: The authentication information. Format: Bearer ${access_token}. Example: Bearer ATxxxx.

DisableUser.title: DisableUser

GetUserIdByEmail.summary: Queries the ID of an Employee Identity and Access Management (EIAM) account by email address.

schema.title: 认证信息，格式:Bearer access_token
schema.description: The authentication information. Format: Bearer ${access_token}. Example: Bearer ATxxxx.

email.title: 邮箱
email.description: The email address of the user who owns the account.

GetUserIdByEmail.title: GetUserIdByEmail

GetUserIdByPhoneNumber.summary: Queries the ID of an Employee Identity and Access Management (EIAM) account based on the mobile number.

schema.title: 认证信息，格式:Bearer access_token
schema.description: The authentication information. Format: Bearer ${access_token}. Example: Bearer ATxxxx.

phoneNumber.title: 手机号
phoneNumber.description: The mobile number of the user who owns the account.

GetUserIdByPhoneNumber.title: GetUserIdByPhoneNumber

GetUserIdByUserExternalId.summary: Queries the ID of an Employee Identity and Access Management (EIAM) account based on the external ID.

schema.title: 认证信息，格式:Bearer access_token
schema.description: The authentication information. Format: Bearer ${access_token}. Example: Bearer ATxxxx.

userExternalId.title: 账户外部ID
userExternalId.description: The external ID of the account.

userSourceType.title: 账户来源类型, 取值可选范围： build_in(自建), ding_talk(钉钉导入),ad(AD导入),ldap(LDAP导入)
userSourceType.description:
The source type of the account. Valid values:

*   build_in: The account was created in Identity as a Service (IDaaS).
*   ding_talk: The account was imported from DingTalk.
*   ad: The account was imported from Microsoft Active Directory (AD).
*   ldap: The account was imported from a Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) service.

userSourceId.title: 账户来源ID,自建类型(build_in)值为实例ID，非自建类型，为对应企业ID，比如钉钉，对应的corpId
userSourceId.description: The source ID of the account. If the account was created in IDaaS, its source ID is the ID of the IDaaS instance. If the account was imported, its source ID is the enterprise ID in the source. For example, if the account was imported from DingTalk, its source ID is the corpId value of the enterprise in DingTalk.

GetUserIdByUserExternalId.title: GetUserIdByUserExternalId

schema.title:
认证信息。
格式:Bearer ${access_token}。
示例：Bearer ATxxxx。
schema.description: The authentication information. Format: Bearer ${access_token}. Example: Bearer ATxxxx.

GetUserIdByUsername.title: GetUserIdByUsername

格式:Bearer ${access_token}。

认证信息。
格式:Bearer ${access_token}。

格式:Bearer ${access_token}。
